title: Repare Therapeutics completes acquisition by XenoTherapeutics
summary: Repare Therapeutics Inc., a clinical‑stage precision oncology company focused on targeted cancer therapies, announced that it has completed its previously announced acquisition by XenoTherapeutics, Inc. and Xeno Acquisition Corp., a non‑profit biotechnology entity, the company said. The statutory plan of arrangement was approved by Repare shareholders in January 2026 and authorised by the Superior Court […] The post Repare Therapeutics completes acquisition by XenoTherapeutics appeared first on Longevity.Technology.
